item.title:
By the way, we’re hiring.
If you’ll be at ETHDenver and are interested in helping Conduit bring scalability and infra to onchain apps across the world, sign up here to talk to our talent team! https://forms.gle/et2Yy37cokLhamybA

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: Thursday morning 2/27 from 8-10:30am, we’re hosting a Rise and Grind coffee hour with our partners @thirdweb. Enjoy coffee, good vibes, and dev talk before the grind begins.
Register here: https://lu.ma/em6ra0i7

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: From Wednesday 2/26 to Friday 2/28, we’re sponsoring the Upgrade the Internet hacker house with @SuccinctLabs and @Celestia.
Show up, hack, learn, hang out, hack some more, win prizes – what could be better?
Register here: https://lu.ma/lgitwu7t

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: On Tuesday 2/25, we’ll be attending @plumenetwork's RWAfi Summit! Our own @forrestnorwood will be speaking on the future of RWAs, so don’t miss it.
Register here: https://lu.ma/4likmazq

item.title:
ETHDenver is coming up. Will you be there? Of course you will. So come say hi to the Conduit team!
Here’s where you can find us throughout the week.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
ETHDenver is coming up. Will you be there? Of course you will. So come say hi to the Conduit team!

item.title:
RT by @conduitxyz: Introducing Y – the Crypto Super App that empowers you to privately build, manage, and benefit from your digital identity built on Ethereum.
Six months ago, we launched our Telegram app and today our community has grown to over 14 million members! 🚀
🧵👇
item.dc:creator: @_Y_nation
item.description:
Introducing Y – the Crypto Super App that empowers you to privately build, manage, and benefit from your digital identity built on Ethereum.

Six months ago, we launched our Telegram app and today our community has grown to over 14 million members! 🚀

🧵👇

item.title:
RT by @conduitxyz: The best rollups are embracing AA 🫡
No less than 15 @conduitxyz rollups are live with ZeroDev, so their devs can build DApps with:
✅ No gas ✅ No approvals ✅ No bridging
Thanks to our integration with Conduit, you can enable AA for your rollup in one click. Try it today!
item.dc:creator: @zerodev_app
item.description:
The best rollups are embracing AA 🫡

No less than 15 @conduitxyz rollups are live with ZeroDev, so their devs can build DApps with:

✅ No gas
✅ No approvals
✅ No bridging

Thanks to our integration with Conduit, you can enable AA for your rollup in one click. Try it today!

nitter.freedit.eu/conduitxyz/status/1892223890111234521#m

item.title: R to @conduitxyz: No rollup platform makes it easier to integrate a powerful data platform like SQD than Conduit. Check it out on Conduit Marketplace today. https://www.conduit.xyz/marketplace
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description: No rollup platform makes it easier to integrate a powerful data platform like SQD than Conduit. Check it out on Conduit Marketplace today. conduit.xyz/marketplace

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: SQD is also leading the way in providing data to power onchain AI agents, as a recent ElizaOS plugin highlights.
If you want your rollup to be a destination for teams in this exciting growth area, integrating SQD is a great place to start.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
SQD is also leading the way in providing data to power onchain AI agents, as a recent ElizaOS plugin highlights.

If you want your rollup to be a destination for teams in this exciting growth area, integrating SQD is a great place to start.

item.title: R to @conduitxyz: SQD aggregates your chain’s data and lets devs access it easily, and in flexible ways. That enables them to build better by understanding what users are doing, surfacing accurate data in app UIs, providing better cross-chain experiences, and more.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description: SQD aggregates your chain’s data and lets devs access it easily, and in flexible ways. That enables them to build better by understanding what users are doing, surfacing accurate data in app UIs, providing better cross-chain experiences, and more.

item.title:
SQD provides permissionless access to petabytes of onchain data and is THE data lake for onchain AI agents.
Integrate your rollup with @helloSQD on Conduit Marketplace and let devs do more with your data.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
SQD provides permissionless access to petabytes of onchain data and is THE data lake for onchain AI agents.

Integrate your rollup with @helloSQD on Conduit Marketplace and let devs do more with your data.

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: FRIDAY 2/28:
4pm: Hacker house project demos, judging, and prizes.
6pm: World’s greatest house party with a special guest surprise DJ. Who will it be?
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
FRIDAY 2/28:

4pm: Hacker house project demos, judging, and prizes.

6pm: World’s greatest house party with a special guest surprise DJ. Who will it be?

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: THURSDAY 2/27:
3pm: zkTLS Special Session with @OpacityNetwork’s @Euler__Lagrange, Earnifi’s @ArynChadha, and @EV3Ventures’ @VinayakDKurup.
6pm: ZK in the Real World Session with @zkemail’s @yush_g, @payy_link’s @sidgandhi_xyz, @roc_camera, and more!
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
THURSDAY 2/27:

3pm: zkTLS Special Session with @OpacityNetwork’s @Euler__Lagrange, Earnifi’s @ArynChadha, and @EV3Ventures’ @VinayakDKurup.

6pm: ZK in the Real World Session with @zkemail’s @yush_g, @payy_link’s @sidgandhi_xyz, @roc_camera, and more!

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: WEDNESDAY 2/26:
6pm: ZK + Crypto Session! Do you love Ethereum? Do you want to learn about scaling blockchains with ZK? Then you can’t miss this.
